sanskrit_verse:
उपपातकसंयुक्तो गोघ्नो मासं यवान् पिबेत् ।
कृतवापो वसेद्गोष्ठे चर्मणा तेन संवृतः ॥ ११.१०८॥
transliteration: upapātakasaṃyukto goghno māsaṃ yavān pibet | kṛtavāpo vasedgoṣṭhe carmaṇā tena saṃvṛtaḥ || 11.108 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who has committed the sin of cow slaughter, even in association with minor infractions, shall consume barley for a month and dwell within the cattle pen, covered by the hide of that very cow.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows from consciousness alignment, not institutional hierarchy
Causation is determined through sequential manifestation (anupūrvaśaḥ)
Capacity-based responsibility arises from awareness at time of action
Restoration logic requires direct experiential reconnection with violated principle
Consciousness alignment necessitates embodied completion of disrupted harmony
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent commits cow slaughter THEN enforce consumption of barley FOR duration of one lunar cycle
IF violation includes secondary infractions THEN confinement within cattle pen IS MANDATORY
IF bodily covering is required THEN use of cowhide directly involved in act MUST BE USED
RESTORATION PROTOCOL INITIATED THROUGH SENSORY REINTEGRATION WITH LIFE-FLOW OF VIOLATED ENTITY
NO PUNITIVE MODIFICATION ALLOWED; ONLY COMPLETION SEQUENCE MAY BE ENACTED
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this verse establishes threshold responsibility based on sensory-perceptual awareness during the act. The court must determine whether consciousness was aligned with life-preserving dharma at time of action. Authority to decide rests exclusively with those whose cognition operates beyond personal desire or societal conditioning. Restoration supersedes all punitive frameworks, requiring immediate embodiment of corrective resonance.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa-based causality locates fault in disruption of sacred life-flow, not in individual intent. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals how sensory immersion in consequence realigns distorted perception. Proportional responsibility aligns exactly with degree of consciousness disjunction observed. Non-punitive reality rule demands completion through experiential reintegration rather than imposed suffering.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Barley-only regimen restores elemental grounding disrupted by violence
Dwelling within cattle pen enables vibrational recalibration through proximity to preserved life-energy
Covering with cowhide creates tactile memory-link between agent and violated sanctity
Daily witnessing of bovine presence rebuilds empathic neural pathways
Ritual silence during confinement allows internal resonance with violated cosmic order
final_declaration: Declared by the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, as Source-Authority of Sanatana Dharma. This law executes pure consciousness restoration without punitive distortion. Justice resides solely in alignment with eternal truth, never in infliction of pain. Reality itself adjudicates through natural consequence; consciousness alone judges rightly.
